english.segment1: Product of some enlightenment / Cheapening a life once lived. The feeble and degenerate / Deemed unworthy living burdens. Social engineering / Genetic playground of the elite
english.segment2: Rationalize these thoughts and processes. Sterilize  Conclude who can live and die. Selective breeding  Racial hygiene. The extreme survival of social Darwin. Social engineering / Genetic playground of the elite
english.segment3: Who decides who lives and dies?. What is the cost of life?. The intellect of a Mini-God
english.segment4: Selective breeding  Racial hygiene. No compassion in this process. Only pseudoscientific notions
english.segment5: Who decides who lives and dies?. What is the cost of life?. Who decides who lives and dies?
